alert.note: Alert for Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 3:03AM MDT until April 15 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Poplar River Near Poplar affecting Roosevelt County. For the Poplar River...including Poplar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poplar River Near Poplar. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Low lying areas near gage site begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM MDT Friday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling over the weekend. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 300 PM MDT.
